attributes.action: Get all careworkers paid more than minimum wage.
attributes.additional_details: I think our vulnerable adults would be at risk if they didn’t have carers risking their lives in this pandemic to support them, they do an excellent job and they deserve a good wage not just now but always
attributes.background: I want careworkers to get more than minimum wage working with vulnerable adults, they have proven they are the backbone of the UK during this Covid-19 pandemic

rejection.details:
The UK Government sets a National Minimum Wage and a National Living Wage, which applies to all workers. The Government and Parliament are not responsible for setting minimum wages for particular industries. This is a matter for individual employers.

We have published a petition calling for the Government to increase the minimum wage, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301749

We have also published petitions calling for key workers to be given hazard pay, a bonus, and tax relief, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
